text: Yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok sek, bɨ teplep God agup tek kɨdek gɨpal okok sek, bɨlel yɨp gos nɨŋɨd yelɨgɨpal agak. Kɨli kuŋay, ne tap tay gɨnɨgab ak nɨgun agɨl kod yelak ak pen ma nɨgɨlak agak. Takaw tay ne agɨnɨgab ak nɨgun agɨl kod yelak ak pen ma nɨgɨlak agak. Mɨñɨl pen nɨbi yad gɨpin ak nɨŋɨd, takaw yad apin ak nɨŋɨd gebɨm agak. God nɨbop nɨm, dɨtep yɨbɨl gek nɨgebɨm anɨb ak tek, mɨñmɨñ gebɨm agak.
